mainText:
Promo: Bank of Entitlement - Where Your Every Whim is Our Command!

Visit Bank of Entitlement dot com for more.

ENTITLEMENT STORY: So there I was, strolling into my favorite coffee shop, basking in my own magnificence, when suddenly the barista had the audacity to ask me to pay for my usual latte. Pay? Me? The CEO of Bank of Entitlement? I was appalled. With a dramatic flourish, I declared, "Do you know who I am? I demand to speak to the manager!" As the other customers gasped in awe at my entitlement, the manager quickly appeared, trembling. I proceeded to lecture him on the importance of recognizing VIPs like myself and the dire consequences of daring to inconvenience me. To make amends, the manager offered me a year's supply of free lattes and a personal apology written on a golden parchment. Satisfied with his groveling, I graciously accepted and sauntered out, my entitlement fully vindicated. Ah, the sweet taste of victory!
